title: Busuu: Learn Spanish Vocabulary & Grammar
description:
Join
100 million
Busuu users waiting to help you with your Spanish grammar & speaking skills!
Become a member of the Busuu community and have your Spanish speaking and writing exercises corrected by native Spanish speakers. Plus, you can help others in your native language!
Learn Spanish vocabulary & grammar by speaking and listening!
- start speaking Spanish with native speakers today!
FEATURES
★ Learn Spanish grammar & vocabulary with specific units, audio dialogues, language games and interactive tests.
★ Increase and 10x your Spanish vocabulary with the review feature
★ Submit practice exercises where native speakers will help you perfect your Spanish grammar & pronunciation.
★ Set yourself a personalised goal to ensure you are reaching your Spanish learning objectives.
★ Personalised to fit your style of learning, ensuring you become proficient in the shortest possible time.
★ Learn the most important 150 topics and 3000 words, specific Spanish training.
★ Test your Spanish grammar, vocabulary & pronunciation with fun quizzes and word games to see how much you have learnt.
SUPPORT & FEEDBACK
Language learner, are you having problems or do you simply just want to help improve the product with your feedback? Please, visit our help centre at https://busuu.zendesk.com/hc/en-us or contact us directly at team@busuu.com.
We are more than happy to answer all the questions and solve any issues, so make sure you contact us before leaving your rating.
MEDIA NEWS
Forbes – “Quicker, Smarter, Better”
New York Times – “easy to use & feels cheerful”
Google – “Must Have App”
BBC – “easier way to learn”
FOLLOW US
Language learning is not only about practice, make sure you follow us on social media and on our blog. We will share a lot of tips, tricks and language games!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/busuucom
Twitter: https://twitter.com/busuu
Google+: https://plus.google.com/+busuu
Blog: https://blog.busuu.com
Website: https://busuu.com
OTHER INFORMATION
Our Spanish language learning app is available in English, French, Spanish, Portuguese, Italian, German, Polish, Japanese, Turkish, Russian and Chinese as interface languages. It’s available in all countries, and regardless of whether you're using your smartphone, tablet or computer.
Learning Spanish is easier than you think, so download the Busuu Spanish app now and start working on your Spanish vocabulary, grammar and pronunciation right away!
